argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subginvcl.i | |- I = ( invg ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( G |`s S ) = ( G |`s S ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_subggrp | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S ) -> ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S ) -> X e. S ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_subgbas | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> S = ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S ) -> S = ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S ) -> X e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) = ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` ( G |`s S ) ) = ( invg ` ( G |`s S ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_grpinvcl | |- ( ( ( G |`s S ) e. Grp /\ X e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) -> ( ( invg ` ( G |`s S ) ) ` X ) e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 8, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S ) -> ( ( invg ` ( G |`s S ) ) ` X ) e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 13 | 2, 1, 10 | #P_subginv | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S ) -> ( I ` X ) = ( ( invg ` ( G |`s S ) ) ` X ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13, 7 | #P_3eltr4d | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S ) -> ( I ` X ) e. S ) |
